summary: Nordic themed shiny gold coin replacer
descriptionHtml:
Better Gold - Nordic Edition (Skyrim) (Mesh and Texture Replacer) v2.00
--------------------------------------------
G'day Elderscrollers.

Better gold coin with a Nordic/Celtic design theme and shiny reflective finish.


Version History
---------------
11.2.2014
v2.00: Completely redone textures with higher resolution and improved normal and specular maps.
New uniquely named cube map to avoid the reflection glitch caused by conflict with certain texture mods eg Skyrim 2K.


Installation
------------
Manual
Extract archive and move the Data folder (Meshes and Textures) to your main Skyrim folder (click 'yes to overwrite' if necessary)



Credits
-------
Bethesda Softworks as always. TES games are my all time favourites.
Me :)


Usage
-----
Can be used in any mod project/release for any ElderScrolls game on condition of credit in the release notes.



Chris aka VA aka VagabondAngel
author: VagabondAngel
